Class PrivateKeyResourceProvider

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl.SecurityResourceProvider
org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl.EntryResourceProvider
org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl.PrivateKeyResourceProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider
public class PrivateKeyResourceProvider extends EntryResourceProvider
A collection resource provider servicing requests on private key entries in a keystore
